name: WP Smoother – Smooth Scroll, Anchor Scroll, Fade Animations
author: Harry Robinson

sections.description:
This simple yet elegant plugin will allow you to make your site super smooth!
All features are editable and can be removed or changed to fit your needs.

Breakdown of features below:

Smooth Mouse Wheel Scrolling

  • Enable / disable functionality
  • Editable scroll distance ( in pixels )
  • Editable scroll animation time ( in milliseconds )

Smooth Anchor Scrolling

  • Enable / disable functionality
  • Editable anchor scroll animation time ( in milliseconds )

Fade Animations on Page Load

  • Enable / disable functionality
  • Fade animation time ( in milliseconds )
  • Enable on homepage only option
sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

All features will automatically enabled and set to the recommended value, navigate to the settings tab to update the options.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

All features will automatically enabled and set to the recommended value, navigate to the settings tab to update the options.

What happens if i stray too far from the recommended values?

If you go too far from the recommended values your site could end up looking silly.

If i uninstall WP Smoother will it clear all of its data?

Yes if you uninstall WP Smoother it will wipe all WP Smoother data in both the database and the files.

short_description: Make your site super smooth, WP Smoother has features such as: smooth mouse wheel scrolling, smooth anchor scrolling and page load fading animations!
